title: Coniglio Type
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000256/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000256/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Coniglio Type**

GREETING FROM JOE CONIGLIO, AUTHOR AND FOUNDER OF CONIGLIO TYPE

Here's what is currently available

----  
This takes you to all of CONIGLIO TYPE'S FONT DESIGNS  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/coniglio/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000256/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/coniglio/ "http://www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/coniglio/")

----  
This is Joseph Coniglio's, Coniglio Type Homepage via the foundry's non-exclusive typography sales page at his revered MyFonts host site. [http://www.myfonts.com/foundry/coniglio/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205000256/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/coniglio/ "http://www.myfonts.com/foundry/coniglio/")

----  
You'll find all you'll need to know at this page, including Coniglio's fonts, bio, explanation of foundry mission, and a fixed philosophy on Coniglio's design that hasn't changed too much, yet is the most up-to-date location, that, anything, you will ever need to know about Coniglio Type can be found including contact information.
author: Joseph Coniglio
